idea: We would like to take this opportunity to introduce ourselves that we 'ASV Sales Corporation Pvt. Ltd.' are leading manufacturers & SUPPLIER of freeze-dried products. idea:
INFI LEAGUE MOTORSPORTS is a recently established startup organization which focuses on the technical and managerial development of students. We are a team of young and dynamic people from engineering and management background. We at INFI LEAGUE, believe in ‘Learn, Implement and Share’ the knowledge.

Our prime objective is to contribute in the development of Indian automobile market by identifying the young talent from various parts of the country.

We wish to work as a bridge between a large network of students, faculties, mentors, engineers, seminars, events, opportunities, creativities, innovations, leadership qualities, industrialists.
name: Infi League Motorsports
